Magic System.description: Covers types of magic, cultivation methods, mystical techniques, and supernatural powers.

tags.name: Alchemy
tags.description: The magical science of creating potions, elixirs, and transmutations.

tags.name: Blood Manipulation
tags.description: Using one's own or others' blood to perform magical feats.

tags.name: Elemental Magic
tags.description: Manipulation of the classical elements (fire, water, earth, air).

tags.name: Firearms
tags.description: Use of magical or enhanced firearms in combat.

tags.name: Magical Girls
tags.description: Characters with magical powers themed in a magical girl style.

tags.name: Magical Space
tags.description: Manipulation of spatial dimensions and magical environments.

tags.name: Magical Technology
tags.description: Combination of magic with technological devices.

tags.name: Martial Spirits
tags.description: Spiritual manifestations used in combat or enhancement.

tags.name: Pill Based Cultivation
tags.description: Enhancement of powers or cultivation through special pills.

tags.name: Pill Concocting
tags.description: Creating magical or medicinal pills for cultivation or combat.

tags.name: Psychic Powers
tags.description: Abilities that stem from the mind, such as telekinesis or telepathy.

tags.name: Sealed Power
tags.description: Powers that are hidden, restricted, or sealed until unlocked.

tags.name: Skill Assimilation
tags.description: Ability to absorb or copy skills from others.

tags.name: Skill Books
tags.description: Books or manuals that grant magical skills when learned.

tags.name: Skill Creation
tags.description: The act of inventing or generating new magical skills.

tags.name: Soul Power
tags.description: Magic derived from the soul or spiritual energy of beings.

tags.name: Spirit Users
tags.description: Individuals who summon or channel spirits for magical use.

tags.name: Summoning Magic
tags.description: Calling creatures, spirits, or objects to fight or assist.

tags.name: Sword And Magic
tags.description: Combining swordsmanship with magical abilities in combat.

tags.name: Unique Cultivation Technique
tags.description: Specialized cultivation methods that are rare or one-of-a-kind.

tags.name: Aura
tags.description: Magical energy surrounding a person, used for combat or perception.

tags.name: Wuxia
tags.description: Martial arts stories with magical or supernatural elements.

tags.name: Xianxia
tags.description: Cultivation stories with Taoist or spiritual magical elements.

tags.name: Rune Magic
tags.description: Using runes, glyphs, or symbols to cast spells.

tags.name: Divinity/Divine Power
tags.description: Powers derived from gods, deities, or divine sources.

tags.name: Artifact Crafting
tags.description: Creating magical items, weapons, or artifacts.

tags.name: Body Tempering
tags.description: Enhancing the physical body through magical or cultivation means.

tags.name: Fast Cultivation
tags.description: Rapid advancement in magical or cultivation abilities.

tags.name: Heavenly Tribulation
tags.description: A test from the heavens that cultivators must survive to advance.

Character Background.description: Describes the protagonist's origin, family situation, and early life circumstances.

tags.name: Adopted Protagonist
tags.description: The main character was adopted and may struggle with identity or family ties.

tags.name: Adopted Children
tags.description: A character in the story is an adopted child, affecting relationships or plot.

tags.name: Abandoned Children
tags.description: Children who were abandoned and may face hardships or adventure as a result.

tags.name: Absent Parents
tags.description: The protagonist’s parents are absent, dead, or otherwise missing during the story.

tags.name: Child Protagonist
tags.description: The main character is a child, influencing perspective and abilities.

tags.name: Elderly Protagonist
tags.description: The main character is elderly, bringing experience or wisdom to the story.

tags.name: Famous Protagonist
tags.description: The protagonist is well-known or celebrated in society, affecting relationships and plot.

tags.name: Half-human Protagonist
tags.description: The main character is partially non-human, often granting unique abilities or challenges.

tags.name: Humanoid Protagonist
tags.description: The main character has a humanoid form, even if non-human in nature.

tags.name: Genderless Protagonist
tags.description: The main character does not have a defined gender, affecting social interactions or story dynamics.

tags.name: Non-humanoid Protagonist
tags.description: The protagonist is a creature or entity not resembling a human.

tags.name: Mysterious Family Background
tags.description: The protagonist's family history is secretive or unknown, often driving plot or character motivation.

Protagonist Traits.description: Personality traits, abilities, and growth paths of the main character.

tags.name: Anti-social Protagonist
tags.description: The protagonist avoids social interaction and prefers solitude.

tags.name: Apathetic Protagonist
tags.description: Shows indifference toward events or people, often detached.

tags.name: Awkward Protagonist
tags.description: Clumsy or socially uncomfortable, often leading to comedic or dramatic situations.

tags.name: Carefree Protagonist
tags.description: Laid-back and easygoing, rarely worried about consequences.

tags.name: Cautious Protagonist
tags.description: Careful and strategic, avoids reckless decisions.

tags.name: Charismatic Protagonist
tags.description: Naturally attractive, influential, and able to inspire others.

tags.name: Charming Protagonist
tags.description: Appealing personality that attracts others easily.

tags.name: Clever Protagonist
tags.description: Intelligent and quick-thinking, often able to outsmart opponents.

tags.name: Confident Protagonist
tags.description: Self-assured and bold, rarely doubts their own abilities.

tags.name: Cold Protagonist
tags.description: Emotionally distant, often appearing detached or ruthless.

tags.name: Curious Protagonist
tags.description: Eager to explore, ask questions, and learn new things.

tags.name: Dense Protagonist
tags.description: Slow to notice things, often oblivious to romantic or social cues.

tags.name: Determined Protagonist
tags.description: Persistent and resolute, rarely gives up on goals.

tags.name: Dishonest Protagonist
tags.description: Frequently lies, deceives, or manipulates others.

tags.name: Distrustful Protagonist
tags.description: Wary of others and slow to trust, often due to past experiences.

tags.name: Forgetful Protagonist
tags.description: Frequently forgets details or important events, causing plot complications.

tags.name: Lazy Protagonist
tags.description: Avoids work or effort, often relying on others or luck.

tags.name: Naive Protagonist
tags.description: Innocent and inexperienced, often misjudges situations or people.

tags.name: Quiet Characters
tags.description: Soft-spoken or reserved, often introspective or observant.

tags.name: Stoic Characters
tags.description: Emotionally restrained, rarely showing feelings.

tags.name: Timid Protagonist
tags.description: Shy or fearful, easily intimidated by challenges or other characters.

tags.name: Unlucky Protagonist
tags.description: Frequently experiences misfortune, often for comedic or dramatic effect.

tags.name: Ugly Protagonist
tags.description: Physically unattractive, often leading to social challenges or character growth.

tags.name: Shameless Protagonist
tags.description: Boldly disregards social norms or embarrassment.

tags.name: Selfish Protagonist
tags.description: Acts primarily for personal gain or benefit, often creating conflict.

tags.name: Selfless Protagonist
tags.description: Prioritizes others’ needs over their own, often heroic.

tags.name: Stubborn Protagonist
tags.description: Unyielding in beliefs or goals, rarely compromises.

tags.name: Hated Protagonist
tags.description: Disliked or reviled by others within the story.

tags.name: Weak Protagonist
tags.description: Starts story with low abilities or power, often grows over time.

tags.name: Low-key Protagonist
tags.description: Blends into the background, not seeking attention.

tags.name: Competent Protagonist
tags.description: Highly skilled and effective at tasks from the beginning.

tags.name: Overpowered Protagonist
tags.description: Extremely strong or capable, often exceeding all others in ability.

tags.name: Amnesiac Protagonist
tags.description: Has lost memory, often leading to mystery or self-discovery arcs.

tags.name: Arrogant Characters
tags.description: Overconfident or prideful, may clash with others.

tags.name: Calm Protagonist
tags.description: Remains composed and rational in high-pressure situations.

tags.name: Cruel Characters
tags.description: Deliberately harsh or merciless toward others.

tags.name: Harem-seeking Protagonist
tags.description: Actively pursues multiple romantic interests.

tags.name: Hot-blooded Protagonist
tags.description: Passionate and impulsive, often acts on emotion.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Calm and cold on the outside, may show softer emotions privately.

tags.name: Money Grubber
tags.description: Primarily motivated by wealth or material gain.

tags.name: Ruthless Protagonist
tags.description: Does whatever it takes to achieve goals, often without mercy.

tags.name: Sharp-tongued Characters
tags.description: Uses biting or witty remarks, often in confrontations.

tags.name: Strong to Stronger
tags.description: Begins strong and continues to grow even more powerful.

tags.name: Weak to Strong
tags.description: Starts weak but gradually becomes powerful through growth or cultivation.

Relationships & Romance.description: Covers romantic relationships, love interests, and interpersonal connections.

tags.name: Arranged Marriage
tags.description: A marriage decided by families or external forces rather than mutual love.

tags.name: Broken Engagement
tags.description: A previously agreed engagement is dissolved, creating drama or tension.

tags.name: Engagement
tags.description: A formal promise to marry that may drive plot events.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: A legally or socially recognized union between two characters.

tags.name: Marriage of Convenience
tags.description: A marriage based on practical reasons rather than love.

tags.name: Love Triangles
tags.description: A romantic situation involving three individuals with intertwined feelings.

tags.name: Reverse Harem
tags.description: A single female protagonist romantically involved with multiple partners.

tags.name: Reversible Couple
tags.description: A couple whose relationship can fluctuate between romantic and non-romantic states.

tags.name: Forced Marriage
tags.description: A marriage imposed on the characters against their will.

tags.name: Forced into a Relationship
tags.description: Characters compelled to date or act as a couple for external reasons.

tags.name: Pretend Lovers
tags.description: Characters feign a romantic relationship, often leading to real feelings.

tags.name: Lovers Reunited
tags.description: Characters who were separated come back together romantically.

tags.name: Childhood Love
tags.description: A romantic connection originating from childhood interactions.

tags.name: Childhood Promise
tags.description: A vow made in childhood, often leading to future romantic development.

tags.name: Love Rivals
tags.description: Competing characters vie for the affection of the same love interest.

tags.name: Love Interest Falls in Love First
tags.description: The love interest develops feelings before the protagonist does.

tags.name: Older Love Interests
tags.description: Romantic partners who are older than the protagonist, often offering guidance or experience.

tags.name: Doting Love Interests
tags.description: Affectionate partners who show excessive care or attention.

tags.name: Kind Love Interests
tags.description: Partners who are gentle, understanding, and supportive.

tags.name: Obsessive Love
tags.description: Intense romantic fixation that can lead to extreme behavior.

tags.name: Cold Love Interests
tags.description: Partners who are distant or emotionally reserved in their romantic interactions.

tags.name: Clingy Lover
tags.description: Partners who are overly dependent or possessive in the relationship.

tags.name: Romantic Subplot
tags.description: Secondary romantic storyline that runs parallel to the main plot.

tags.name: Beautiful Female Lead
tags.description: A female character who is notably attractive and central to romantic development.

tags.name: Devoted Love Interests
tags.description: Partners completely loyal and committed to the protagonist.

tags.name: Early Romance
tags.description: Romantic feelings or relationships that develop early in the story.

tags.name: Enemies Become Lovers
tags.description: Characters who start as adversaries but eventually fall in love.

tags.name: Handsome Male Lead
tags.description: A male character who is attractive and central to the romance plot.

tags.name: Long Separations
tags.description: Couples separated for extended periods, testing love or loyalty.

tags.name: Polygamy
tags.description: Romantic or marital relationships involving multiple partners simultaneously.

tags.name: Popular Love Interests
tags.description: Characters admired or desired by many, often causing competition.

tags.name: Protagonist Falls in Love First
tags.description: The protagonist develops feelings before the love interest.

tags.name: Strong Love Interests
tags.description: Partners who are confident, capable, or influential in the relationship.

tags.name: Unconditional Love
tags.description: Love given without conditions, expectations, or limitations.

World & Setting.description: The environment or world where the story takes place, including eras, locations, and dimensions.

tags.name: Academy
tags.description: A school or institution where characters learn, train, or grow.

tags.name: All-Girls School
tags.description: An educational institution exclusively for female characters.

tags.name: Alternate World
tags.description: A world different from the protagonist's original world, often with unique rules or history.

tags.name: Ancient China
tags.description: A setting inspired by historical China with period-accurate culture and society.

tags.name: Ancient Times
tags.description: A time period set in early historical eras, often pre-modern civilization.

tags.name: Apartment Life
tags.description: A modern or urban setting where characters live in apartments.

tags.name: Apocalypse
tags.description: A world after a catastrophic event, often featuring survival challenges.

tags.name: College/University
tags.description: An educational institution for higher learning and character growth.

tags.name: Dystopia
tags.description: A society characterized by oppression, surveillance, or despair.

tags.name: Earth Invasion
tags.description: A setting involving alien or external forces invading Earth.

tags.name: European Ambience
tags.description: A world with cultural, architectural, and historical elements inspired by Europe.

tags.name: Futuristic Setting
tags.description: A world set in the future with advanced technology or societies.

tags.name: Hollywood
tags.description: A world inspired by the film industry or celebrity culture.

tags.name: Industrialization
tags.description: A world during or after industrial development, emphasizing machinery and industry.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: A historical setting inspired by the European Middle Ages.

tags.name: Modern Day
tags.description: The present-day world, often realistic or contemporary.

tags.name: Post-apocalyptic
tags.description: A world recovering from catastrophic destruction or societal collapse.

tags.name: Parallel Worlds
tags.description: Multiple coexisting realities or dimensions with different rules.

tags.name: Transported to Another World
tags.description: Protagonist is sent from their world into another, often fantasy.

tags.name: Transported into a Game World
tags.description: Characters are sent into a virtual or gamified environment.

tags.name: Transported Modern Structure
tags.description: A modern-day building or facility is moved to another setting or world.

tags.name: World Hopping
tags.description: Characters move between multiple worlds frequently.

tags.name: World Travel
tags.description: Exploration or journeying across different lands or countries.

tags.name: World Tree
tags.description: A setting centered around a mystical or symbolic tree connecting worlds.

tags.name: Gate to Another World
tags.description: A portal or gate allows passage to a different realm or dimension.

tags.name: Outer Space
tags.description: A setting in space, often involving planets, stars, or spacecraft.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: A modern city infused with magical or fantastical elements.

tags.name: Dungeon/Tower Setting
tags.description: Stories set inside dungeons, towers, or labyrinths with challenges.

tags.name: Dungeon Master
tags.description: A character or entity controlling or guiding dungeon events.

tags.name: Battle Academy
tags.description: A specialized school for combat training or magical battle education.

Creatures & Species.description: Non-human characters, magical creatures, and companions in the story.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Divine winged beings with holy powers.

tags.name: Beast Companions
tags.description: Animals or beasts that accompany and assist characters.

tags.name: Beastkin
tags.description: Humanoid characters with animal traits or abilities.

tags.name: Beasts
tags.description: Non-humanoid creatures, often wild or magical.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Large, often intelligent reptiles with magical powers.

tags.name: Dragon Riders
tags.description: Characters who ride dragons and often share a bond.

tags.name: Dragon Slayers
tags.description: Characters specialized in fighting dragons.

tags.name: Demi-Humans
tags.description: Half-human or hybrid species with mixed traits.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Supernatural beings often opposing humans or angels.

tags.name: Fairies
tags.description: Small magical creatures with wings, often mischievous or helpful.

tags.name: Fallen Angels
tags.description: Angelic beings who have been corrupted or exiled.

tags.name: Fox Spirits
tags.description: Mythical foxes with magical powers, often shapeshifters.

tags.name: Goblins
tags.description: Small, often mischievous or malevolent creatures.

tags.name: Humanoid Protagonist
tags.description: Protagonists with human-like form regardless of species.

tags.name: Monsters
tags.description: Creatures typically hostile, strange, or fantastical.

tags.name: Monster Girls
tags.description: Female characters with monstrous traits or hybrid forms.

tags.name: Mythical Beasts
tags.description: Legendary or magical creatures from myths and legends.

tags.name: Phoenixes
tags.description: Fire-based mythical birds that can resurrect from ashes.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Demonic female entities who seduce or manipulate humans.

tags.name: Vampires
tags.description: Undead beings that drink blood to survive, often immortal.

tags.name: Werebeasts
tags.description: Humans who can transform into animals or hybrids.

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Magic Beasts
tags.description: Animals or creatures with magical abilities.

tags.name: Loli
tags.description: Characters depicted as young or childlike, often in fantasy or magical contexts.

Technology & Sci-Fi.description: Technology, futuristic elements, sci-fi mechanics, and virtual worlds.

tags.name: Advanced technology
tags.description: Highly developed devices, machines, or systems beyond current human capability.

tags.name: Androids
tags.description: Human-like robots with artificial intelligence or advanced programming.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Sentient or advanced computer systems capable of independent thought or learning.

tags.name: Automatons
tags.description: Mechanical constructs designed to perform tasks automatically.

tags.name: Biochip
tags.description: Biological integrated chips implanted in living beings for enhanced abilities or control.

tags.name: Genetic Modifications
tags.description: Alterations of DNA to enhance abilities, appearance, or traits.

tags.name: Human Experimentation
tags.description: Scientific testing on humans, often ethically dubious.

tags.name: Human Weapon
tags.description: Humans enhanced or trained to be weapons using technology or abilities.

tags.name: Magical Technology
tags.description: Integration of magic with technology to create advanced systems.

tags.name: MMORPG
tags.description: Game or virtual world with multiplayer online elements influencing the story.

tags.name: Virtual Reality
tags.description: Immersive computer-simulated environments that characters can interact with.

tags.name: Technological Gap
tags.description: Disparity in technology levels between societies or characters.

tags.name: Programmer
tags.description: Character skilled in coding or creating software systems.

tags.name: System
tags.description: A structured digital or magical interface controlling rules or abilities.

tags.name: System Administrator
tags.description: A character who manages or controls a system.

Organizations & Factions.description: Groups, guilds, armies, factions, or social structures that drive plot or conflict.

tags.name: Army
tags.description: A large organized military force.

tags.name: Army Building
tags.description: The process of creating, training, or expanding an army.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Individuals trained to carry out secretive killings or missions.

tags.name: Clan Building
tags.description: Forming, growing, and managing a clan or family group.

tags.name: Criminals
tags.description: Characters engaging in illegal or illicit activities.

tags.name: Cultivation
tags.description: Groups or sects focused on spiritual or magical growth.

tags.name: Cultivation Technique
tags.description: Methods, schools, or teachings used by groups to improve power.

tags.name: Evil Organizations
tags.description: Groups with malicious or antagonistic intent.

tags.name: Faction Development
tags.description: Building and growing a faction’s influence and capabilities.

tags.name: Gang
tags.description: A smaller organized group involved in crime or territorial control.

tags.name: Guilds
tags.description: Associations of people with shared professions or goals.

tags.name: Kingdoms
tags.description: Political states ruled by a monarch or ruling family.

tags.name: Sect Development
tags.description: Creating, strengthening, and expanding a sect or religious/magical group.

tags.name: Territory Management
tags.description: Overseeing, defending, or expanding control over land or territory.

tags.name: Secret Organization
tags.description: A hidden group working behind the scenes with covert goals.

tags.name: Underworld/Mafia
tags.description: Criminal organizations operating outside the law.

tags.name: Brotherhood
tags.description: A close-knit group bound by loyalty and shared purpose.

tags.name: Leadership
tags.description: The act or role of guiding or controlling a group or organization.

tags.name: Loyal Subordinates
tags.description: Members who are faithful and obedient to their leader.

tags.name: Nobles
tags.description: High-ranking individuals often holding power, titles, or wealth.

tags.name: Spies
tags.description: Individuals who gather information secretly for an organization or faction.

Tone & Themes.description: Narrative style, mood, and recurring thematic elements of the story.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Themes involving performance, deception, or characters putting on facades.

tags.name: Apocalypse
tags.description: A setting or theme featuring catastrophic destruction or the end of the world.

tags.name: Betrayal
tags.description: Themes where trust is broken or characters are deceived by allies.

tags.name: Comedic Undertone
tags.description: Humor is woven throughout the story, lightening tension or drama.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Focuses on character growth and maturation from youth to adulthood.

tags.name: Dark
tags.description: A serious, grim, or morally complex tone throughout the story.

tags.name: Depression
tags.description: Themes of mental health struggles, sadness, or despair.

tags.name: Heartwarming
tags.description: Scenes or themes that evoke warmth, compassion, or emotional fulfillment.

tags.name: Philosophical
tags.description: Explores existential, ethical, or thought-provoking concepts.

tags.name: Psychopaths
tags.description: Characters with anti-social or morally extreme behavior central to the story.

tags.name: Schemes And Conspiracies
tags.description: Plots involving manipulation, strategy, or hidden agendas.

tags.name: Tragic Past
tags.description: Characters’ histories filled with misfortune or trauma affecting their present.

tags.name: Twisted Personality
tags.description: Characters with morally or psychologically complex traits.

tags.name: Death of Loved Ones
tags.description: Themes involving loss of family, friends, or companions.

tags.name: Harsh Training
tags.description: Themes of intense, difficult, or grueling preparation or education.

tags.name: Poor to Rich
tags.description: Themes of social mobility or rising from poverty to wealth.

tags.name: Unreliable Narrator
tags.description: A narrator whose account may be deceptive, mistaken, or biased.

Adult/Explicit.description: Mature content including sexual themes and explicit material.

tags.name: R-15
tags.description: Content suitable for audiences 15 and older, mild mature themes.

tags.name: R-18
tags.description: Content suitable only for adults, includes explicit sexual or violent material.

tags.name: An*l
tags.description: Sexual content involving anal intercourse.

tags.name: BDSM
tags.description: Content involving bondage, discipline, dominance/submission, or sadomasochism.

tags.name: Black Belly
tags.description: Pregnancy-themed adult content, often non-consensual or magical conception.

tags.name: C*nnilingus
tags.description: Oral sexual activity performed on a female.

tags.name: F*llatio
tags.description: Oral sexual activity performed on a male.

tags.name: H*ndjob
tags.description: Manual stimulation of the male genitalia for sexual pleasure.

tags.name: M*sturbation
tags.description: Self-stimulation for sexual pleasure.

tags.name: Netorare
tags.description: Themes involving a partner being taken by someone else.

tags.name: Netorase
tags.description: Content involving characters encouraging or orchestrating partner infidelity.

tags.name: Netori
tags.description: Similar to NTR, involves seducing someone’s partner.

tags.name: Omegaverse
tags.description: A genre with hierarchical biological roles such as Alpha, Beta, and Omega.

tags.name: Or*y
tags.description: Orgy or group sexual activity.

tags.name: Paizuri
tags.description: Sexual activity involving breast stimulation.

tags.name: Pe*verted Protagonist
tags.description: Main character displaying sexual deviance or obsession.

tags.name: R*pe
tags.description: Non-consensual sexual activity.

tags.name: R*pe Victim Becomes Lover
tags.description: Storylines where sexual assault victims develop romantic feelings for the perpetrator.

tags.name: S*ave Harem
tags.description: Multiple submissive partners devoted to one dominant character.

tags.name: S*ave Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is submissive or controlled in sexual contexts.

tags.name: S*aves
tags.description: Supporting characters in submissive or controlled sexual roles.

tags.name: S*x Friends
tags.description: Characters engaged in sexual relationships without romantic commitment.

tags.name: S*x S*aves
tags.description: Characters explicitly designated for sexual purposes.

tags.name: S*xual Abuse
tags.description: Non-consensual sexual activity or exploitation.

tags.name: S*xual Cultivation Technique
tags.description: Sexual activity used as a method to increase power, strength, or abilities.

tags.name: Tentacles
tags.description: Sexual content involving tentacle creatures or appendages.

tags.name: Threesome
tags.description: Sexual activity involving three participants.

tags.name: Outdoor Interc**rse
tags.description: Sexual activity occurring outdoors or in public places.

tags.name: First-time Interc**rse
tags.description: Depicts a character's first sexual experience.

Game & System.description: Story elements inspired by games, system mechanics, and ranking systems.

tags.name: Game Elements
tags.description: Features, mechanics, or aspects derived from games.

tags.name: Game Ranking System
tags.description: A system that ranks characters or players based on performance or points.

tags.name: Cheats
tags.description: Special abilities or exploits that bypass standard rules or limitations.

tags.name: Level System
tags.description: A progression system where characters gain levels to increase power.

tags.name: MMORPG
tags.description: Massively multiplayer online role-playing game elements in the story.

tags.name: System
tags.description: Structured digital or magical interface controlling rules, abilities, or events.

tags.name: System Administrator
tags.description: A character who manages, controls, or oversees a system or game interface.

Plot Devices.description: Narrative mechanisms, plot twists, and storytelling devices.

tags.name: Age Progression
tags.description: Characters grow older over time, often affecting abilities or status.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Characters revert to a younger age, either physically or mentally.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Characters lose memories, creating conflict or mystery.

tags.name: Body Swap
tags.description: Two characters exchange bodies temporarily or permanently.

tags.name: Body-double
tags.description: A character takes the place of another for disguise or plot purposes.

tags.name: Conditional Power
tags.description: Abilities that activate only under specific circumstances.

tags.name: Death
tags.description: The loss of characters, often driving plot or emotional arcs.

tags.name: Dreams
tags.description: Use of dreams to foreshadow, reveal secrets, or drive narrative.

tags.name: Evolution
tags.description: Gradual development or transformation of characters or species.

tags.name: Fated Lovers
tags.description: Romantic partners destined to meet or be together.

tags.name: Flashbacks
tags.description: Scenes from the past revealing character background or plot.

tags.name: Identity Crisis
tags.description: Characters struggle with their self-perception or role.

tags.name: Multiple Identities
tags.description: A character maintains more than one persona or identity.

tags.name: Multiple POV
tags.description: Story told from multiple character perspectives.

tags.name: Multiple Personalities
tags.description: Characters with distinct psychological personalities within one body.

tags.name: Multiple Protagonists
tags.description: More than one central character sharing the narrative focus.

tags.name: Multiple Realms
tags.description: Story spans across different worlds or dimensions.

tags.name: Multiple Reincarnated Individuals
tags.description: Several characters are reborn into new lives, influencing the plot.

tags.name: Multiple Timelines
tags.description: Events occur across more than one timeline, often interacting.

tags.name: Multiple Transported Individuals
tags.description: Several characters are moved to another world or dimension.

tags.name: Near-Death Experience
tags.description: Character experiences life-threatening situations, often triggering growth or insight.

tags.name: Precognition
tags.description: Ability to foresee future events or outcomes.

tags.name: Previous Life Talent
tags.description: Skills or knowledge carried over from a past life.

tags.name: Rebellion
tags.description: Plot involves uprising against authority or societal norms.

tags.name: Reincarnated as a Monster
tags.description: Character is reborn into a non-human or monstrous form.

tags.name: Reincarnated as an Object
tags.description: Character is reborn into an inanimate form.

tags.name: Reincarnated in Another World
tags.description: Character is reborn in a different world or realm.

tags.name: Reincarnated in a Game World
tags.description: Character is reborn inside a virtual game or simulated world.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: The process of being reborn after death, carrying over some traits or memories.

tags.name: Returning from Another World
tags.description: Character comes back to their original world after traveling elsewhere.

tags.name: Resurrection
tags.description: Character is brought back to life after death.

tags.name: Time Loop
tags.description: Events repeat until certain conditions are met.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Characters or plot can alter, speed up, slow down, or freeze time.

tags.name: Time Paradox
tags.description: Events create contradictions in timelines that must be resolved.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Story jumps forward in time, skipping over events.

tags.name: Transmigration
tags.description: Soul or consciousness moves to another body, often in another world.

tags.name: Transplanted Memories
tags.description: Characters gain memories from others or past lives.

tags.name: Prophecy
tags.description: Events foretold or predicted affecting the plot.

tags.name: Hidden Lineage
tags.description: Character’s family background or heritage is initially unknown.

tags.name: Prophecies
tags.description: Multiple predictions that influence character decisions and story events.

Occupation & Roles.description: Professions, jobs, or roles that characters play in the story.

tags.name: Adventurers
tags.description: Characters who explore, quest, or take risks for treasure, glory, or purpose.

tags.name: Artists
tags.description: Characters involved in creative or artistic pursuits like painting, music, or performance.

tags.name: Authors
tags.description: Characters who write books, novels, or literature.

tags.name: Chefs
tags.description: Characters skilled in cooking or culinary arts.

tags.name: Doctors
tags.description: Medical professionals involved in treating illness or injuries.

tags.name: Editors
tags.description: Characters involved in revising, managing, or producing written content.

tags.name: Engineers
tags.description: Characters who design, build, or maintain machines or structures.

tags.name: Hackers
tags.description: Characters skilled in breaking into digital systems or manipulating software.

tags.name: Lawyers
tags.description: Legal professionals who advise, defend, or prosecute within legal systems.

tags.name: Mangaka
tags.description: Comic or manga creators who write and illustrate their works.

tags.name: Pilots
tags.description: Characters who operate aircraft or spacecraft.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Law enforcement officials maintaining order or investigating crimes.

tags.name: Programmer
tags.description: Character skilled in coding or software development.

tags.name: Reporters
tags.description: Characters who investigate and report news or events.

tags.name: Singers
tags.description: Characters who perform vocally or professionally in music.

tags.name: Teachers
tags.description: Characters who educate or mentor others.

tags.name: Waiters
tags.description: Characters who serve food or beverages professionally.

tags.name: Writers
tags.description: Characters who create written content such as stories or articles.

tags.name: Soldiers
tags.description: Characters trained for combat and military operations.

tags.name: Mercenaries
tags.description: Combatants hired for pay rather than loyalty or nation.

tags.name: Businessmen
tags.description: Characters involved in commercial or corporate activities.

tags.name: Butlers
tags.description: Servants responsible for household management and personal assistance.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Characters employed for domestic work and personal service.

tags.name: Shikigami
tags.description: Spirit familiars or magical servants summoned by a practitioner.

tags.name: Priests
tags.description: Religious male figures conducting rituals or guiding followers.

tags.name: Priestesses
tags.description: Religious female figures conducting rituals or guiding followers.

tags.name: Dao Companion
tags.description: Characters aiding cultivation or spiritual practice in Daoist traditions.

tags.name: Dao Comprehension
tags.description: Characters who guide or interpret Daoist understanding for others.

Power & Abilities.description: Special powers, unique abilities, and supernatural skills of characters.

tags.name: Ability Steal
tags.description: The power to take abilities from others for personal use.

tags.name: Advanced Technology
tags.description: Enhanced tools or equipment that grant characters superior capabilities.

tags.name: Anti-Magic
tags.description: Abilities that nullify or counteract magic.

tags.name: Conditional Power
tags.description: Powers that activate only under specific conditions.

tags.name: Cheats
tags.description: Unfair or extraordinary abilities that bypass normal rules.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Powers that inflict harm, misfortune, or restrictions on others.

tags.name: Divination
tags.description: Ability to foresee events or gain insight through supernatural means.

tags.name: Divine Protection
tags.description: Blessings or shields granted by divine forces.

tags.name: Evolution
tags.description: Abilities that allow growth or transformation to stronger forms.

tags.name: Flashbacks
tags.description: Reliving past experiences that grant knowledge or abilities.

tags.name: Hidden Abilities
tags.description: Skills or powers initially unknown or concealed.

tags.name: Hiding True Abilities
tags.description: The act of concealing one’s real powers from others.

tags.name: Hiding True Identity
tags.description: Concealing personal identity or origins.

tags.name: Immortals
tags.description: Characters who cannot die or age naturally.

tags.name: Infinite Flow
tags.description: Unlimited energy, mana, or power supply.

tags.name: Limited Lifespan
tags.description: Powers or beings with a restricted lifetime or duration.

tags.name: Precognition
tags.description: Ability to foresee future events.

tags.name: Sealed Power
tags.description: Powers that are locked or restricted until released.

tags.name: Skill Assimilation
tags.description: The ability to learn or absorb skills from others.

tags.name: Skill Creation
tags.description: Ability to invent or manifest new skills or techniques.

tags.name: Special Abilities
tags.description: Unique powers that differentiate a character from others.

tags.name: Strength-based Social Hierarchy
tags.description: Ranking or power determined by physical or magical strength.

tags.name: Unique Weapon User
tags.description: Character capable of wielding a distinctive or singular weapon.

tags.name: Unique Weapons
tags.description: Special weapons with abilities or properties not found elsewhere.

tags.name: Unlimited Flow
tags.description: Continuous power or energy without depletion.

tags.name: Transformation Ability
tags.description: Ability to change shape, form, or state.

tags.name: Spatial Manipulation
tags.description: Power to control space, distance, or dimensions.

tags.name: Godly Powers
tags.description: Abilities that rival or emulate divine forces.

tags.name: Bloodlines
tags.description: Special powers inherited through family lineage.

tags.name: Spirit Advisor
tags.description: Spiritual beings that guide or enhance a character’s abilities.

tags.name: Strong to Stronger
tags.description: Character progression from capable to overwhelmingly powerful.

tags.name: Adapted to Manhua
tags.description: The story has been adapted into a manhua (Chinese comic) format.

tags.description: The main character of the story is male.
